job description:
You´ll help to drive the analytical scope and methods for projects, including formulating and sharing models.

You´ll use math, stats and machine learning to derive key insights across various industry sectors including sports, pharma, automotive and high-tech. You´ll lead the data science aspect of multiple engagements while also working on complex data sets from some of the world’s largest organizations. You´ll work in a multi-disciplinary environment mixing highly skilled people in data science, data engineering and design. You´ll build strong links with the academic world and constantly share ideas. You will stay ahead of the curve on the latest methods and help grow and shape an elite team of world-class data scientists.
